Convert Seurat Object to 3D Expression Array

Source: R/trajectory_transform.R
seurat_to_trajectory_array.Rd

This function processes a Seurat object to create a 3D array of binned expression data.

Usage

seurat_to_trajectory_array(
  seurat_obj,
  assay = "RNA",
  slot = "data",
  pseudo_col,
  project_col,
  thred = 0.1,
  batch_thred = 0.3,
  n_bin = 100,
  ensure_tail = TRUE,
  tail_width = 0.3,
  tail_num = 0.02
)

Arguments

seurat_obj

A Seurat object

assay

Assay to use for expression data (default: "RNA")

slot

Slot to use for expression data (default: "data")

pseudo_col

Column name in meta.data containing pseudotime values

project_col

Column name in meta.data containing batch/project information

thred

Threshold for gene filtering (proportion of non-zero bins) (default: 0.1)

batch_thred

Threshold for batch filtering (proportion of bins present) (default: 0.3)

n_bin

Number of bins for pseudotime (default: 100)

ensure_tail

Whether to ensure quality in trajectory tail (default: TRUE)

tail_width

Width of trajectory tail to examine (default: 0.3)

tail_num

Minimum proportion of bins required in tail (default: 0.02)

Value

A list containing the processed data
